welcome_message_body: Welcome to Retalhuleu, Guatemala! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its rich Mayan heritage and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this vibrant destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Tertulias
restaurants.description: Restaurante Tertulias is a mexican restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Hotel Posada De Don Jose
restaurants.description: Hotel Posada De Don Jose is a latin american restaurant located in Retalhuleu.

restaurants.description: Carnitas Rosy Retalhuleu is a latin american restaurant located in Retalhuleu.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Casañeja
restaurants.description: Restaurante Casañeja is a bbq joint located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all shipments and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
